qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run still not clean
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: Targeted reruns on 2026-02-11 now show mixed status: `hub-flow` is green, but `audit-logs` and all `llm-generate` cases still fail. Full-suite green validation remains blocked.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: `llm-generate.spec.ts` still fails all three assertions on 2026-02-11. Assistant bubbles resolve but remain empty (`""`), and expected error/tool-confirmation UI is not rendered from mocked payloads.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: `tests/audit-logs.spec.ts` remains reproducibly red on 2026-02-11 (`user-0` row not visible), even after GET-specific waits and route matcher updates.

qa-2026-02-11-e2e-mock-route-interceptio.title: Playwright API mocks are still not deterministic for critical UI assertions
qa-2026-02-11-e2e-mock-route-interceptio.details: Current mocking strategy still allows scenarios where responses are observed but expected UI state does not materialize (notably `audit-logs` and `llm-generate`). Mock contract and render timing need deterministic guards.

qa-2026-02-11-e2e-service-isolation-coll.title: E2E global setup aborts when leftover local services occupy test ports
qa-2026-02-11-e2e-service-isolation-coll.details: Observed repeatedly on 2026-02-11: global setup aborts with `Detected already running services (beta=localhost:5502)` or Angular `Port 4300 is already in use` when prior runs leave listeners behind.

qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.title: Locally spawned E2E services show intermittent internal health read timeouts
qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.details: Intermittent `Hub healthcheck still failing...` messages still appear on 2026-02-11 despite tests continuing. Startup/readiness remains timing-sensitive.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.title: waitForHub setup timeout mitigated but still noisy
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.details: The waitForHub fallback avoids hard failure, but repeated warning logs still obscure actionable failures in CI-style output.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows still need full-run confirmation
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: Current focus runs did not include full teams/templates coverage after latest fixes. End-to-end confirmation is still pending.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: E2E global setup spends time on repeated startup work
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: Repeated multi-service bootstrap dominates iterative debug runtime; additional setup caching/short-circuiting is still open.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis host tuning warning remains non-blocking but unresolved.

backend-2026-02-12-rag-api-endpoint-for-.title: Expose HybridOrchestrator via dedicated API endpoint
backend-2026-02-12-rag-api-endpoint-for-.details: Add `/api/sgpt/context` or `/api/rag/context` endpoint that calls `HybridOrchestrator.get_relevant_context(query)` and returns engine mix, ranked chunks, and context summary.

backend-2026-02-12-sgpt-route-wiring-for.title: Wire SGPT execute route to optional context-aware mode
backend-2026-02-12-sgpt-route-wiring-for.details: Extend `/api/sgpt/execute` payload with a guarded flag (e.g. `use_hybrid_context`) and route SGPT prompt generation through HybridOrchestrator when enabled.

backend-2026-02-12-aider-repository-map-.title: Implement incremental repository-map cache invalidation
backend-2026-02-12-aider-repository-map-.details: Add file-mtime or git-hash based incremental rebuild for symbol graph to avoid full reparse on each request for large repositories.

backend-2026-02-12-tree-sitter-language-.title: Expand and validate Tree-Sitter language support matrix
backend-2026-02-12-tree-sitter-language-.details: Define supported languages, parser mapping, and fallback behavior for unsupported extensions; ensure symbol extraction quality across key repo languages.

backend-2026-02-12-vibe-agent-skill-regi.title: Add explicit skill registry and simple planner for agentic search
backend-2026-02-12-vibe-agent-skill-regi.details: Refactor agentic shell search into a skill registry with deterministic selection and execution budget per query, inspired by Mistral Vibe sub-agent flow.

backend-2026-02-12-agentic-search-budget.title: Enforce query-time execution budgets for agentic shell calls
backend-2026-02-12-agentic-search-budget.details: Introduce per-request limits for number of shell commands, total runtime, and output size to keep latency and token growth bounded on 3 GB datasets.

backend-2026-02-12-llamaindex-ingestion-.title: Build persistent LlamaIndex ingestion pipeline for non-code sources
backend-2026-02-12-llamaindex-ingestion-.details: Add ingestion job for PDFs/logs/docs with chunking metadata, persistence, and update strategy so semantic retrieval does not rebuild index at runtime.

backend-2026-02-12-semantic-index-storag.title: Define vector index storage backend and lifecycle
backend-2026-02-12-semantic-index-storag.details: Choose and document persistence backend for LlamaIndex (local/simple or external vector DB), including backup, rebuild, and migration path.

backend-2026-02-12-context-manager-decis.title: Version decision logic for engine routing
backend-2026-02-12-context-manager-decis.details: Move query routing heuristics into a versioned policy module with tunable thresholds to support safe iteration and rollback.

backend-2026-02-12-cross-engine-rerankin.title: Improve reranking with source diversity constraints
backend-2026-02-12-cross-engine-rerankin.details: Add reranking rules that avoid single-engine dominance and enforce a balanced mix from repository-map, semantic chunks, and agentic evidence.

backend-2026-02-12-token-budgeted-contex.title: Implement strict token-budgeted context assembly
backend-2026-02-12-token-budgeted-contex.details: Replace char-limit only logic with token-aware budgeting to guarantee bounded context size and preserve headroom for answer generation.

backend-2026-02-12-rag-configuration-sur.title: Expose RAG tuning parameters in central config
backend-2026-02-12-rag-configuration-sur.details: Add config keys for engine quotas, max chunks, indexing paths, command budget, and fallback behavior via existing config API and settings.

backend-2026-02-12-rag-observability-met.title: Add RAG metrics and audit events per engine
backend-2026-02-12-rag-observability-met.details: Emit metrics for retrieval latency, chunk counts, and hit distribution; log audit entries when agentic search executes shell commands.

sec-2026-02-12-agentic-shell-allowlist-h.title: Harden shell command allowlist and argument sanitization
sec-2026-02-12-agentic-shell-allowlist-h.details: Restrict agentic execution to audited safe commands and sanitized arguments; block command chaining and dangerous shell metacharacters.

sec-2026-02-12-context-redaction-for-sec.title: Redact secrets and PII before context leaves retrieval layer
sec-2026-02-12-context-redaction-for-sec.details: Introduce redaction filters for tokens, passwords, keys, and personal data in retrieved chunks before SGPT prompt assembly.

docs-2026-02-12-architecture-update-for-.title: Update architecture docs and diagrams for Aider/Vibe/LlamaIndex flow
docs-2026-02-12-architecture-update-for-.details: Add component and sequence diagrams showing ContextManager decisions, engine interactions, and SGPT integration points.

docs-2026-02-12-api-contract-for-rag-end.title: Document API contract for context and execution endpoints
docs-2026-02-12-api-contract-for-rag-end.details: Define request/response schemas, error codes, and examples for new RAG context endpoint and SGPT context-aware execution mode.

docs-2026-02-12-operations-runbook-for-i.title: Create operations runbook for indexing lifecycle
docs-2026-02-12-operations-runbook-for-i.details: Document initial indexing, incremental rebuilds, failure recovery, storage sizing for 3 GB data, and safe rollout/rollback procedure.

docs-2026-02-12-developer-guide-for-engi.title: Add developer guide for adding or tuning retrieval engines
docs-2026-02-12-developer-guide-for-engi.details: Provide contribution guide for adding languages, skills, rerankers, and ingestion adapters without breaking orchestrator contracts.

fe-2026-02-12-context-debug-view-in-ai-a.title: Add context inspection panel in AI assistant UI
fe-2026-02-12-context-debug-view-in-ai-a.details: Render selected chunks with engine labels, scores, and source paths so users can inspect why answers were generated.

fe-2026-02-12-toggle-for-hybrid-context-.title: Add UI toggle for context-aware SGPT execution
fe-2026-02-12-toggle-for-hybrid-context-.details: Add explicit control in UI for enabling/disabling HybridOrchestrator mode per request and surface resulting strategy metadata.

fe-2026-02-12-source-citations-and-open-.title: Show source citations with actionable file links
fe-2026-02-12-source-citations-and-open-.details: Display source provenance for each answer chunk and enable quick-open actions for repository files and documents.

qa-2026-02-12-unit-tests-for-context-man.title: Add unit tests for query routing and reranking behavior
qa-2026-02-12-unit-tests-for-context-man.details: Cover routing decisions, budget clipping, deduplication, and engine-mix balancing in ContextManager and HybridOrchestrator.

qa-2026-02-12-integration-tests-for-rag-.title: Add integration tests for new RAG API and SGPT execution path
qa-2026-02-12-integration-tests-for-rag-.details: Validate endpoint contracts, fallback behavior when engines fail, and that context-aware mode still returns stable SGPT responses.

qa-2026-02-12-load-tests-for-3gb-indexin.title: Create load/perf tests for 3 GB dataset retrieval
qa-2026-02-12-load-tests-for-3gb-indexin.details: Benchmark indexing throughput, query latency, memory ceiling, and context-size guarantees under realistic mixed code/text workloads.

qa-2026-02-12-e2e-tests-for-frontend-rag.title: Add E2E tests for frontend context controls and citation rendering
qa-2026-02-12-e2e-tests-for-frontend-rag.details: Cover UI toggle behavior, context panel rendering, citation visibility, and backward compatibility of existing assistant flows.
